EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: Register to Win LEGOS | New VMT-Shirt | turboticker October 2014
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-webinar-garland-texas/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ticker&utm_content=101514> Deploy VMTurbo. Get Awesome Shirt. Deploy the free 30-day trial of VMTurbo Operations Manager <http://vmturbo.com/product/operations-management-software/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ticker&utm_content=101514> in your environment, and weâ€™ll send you a Limited Edition "I Do Not Fear SAN People" <http://vmturbo.com/request-vmturbo-shirt/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ticker&utm_content=101514> t-shirt. (Our agentless, self-contained virtual appliance typically deploys in 30 minutes, regardless of scale.) Blog: Ops Are From Mars, Devs Are From Venus Pt. 1 <http://vmturbo.com/about-virtualization/ops-mars-devs-venus-1-love-story/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ticker&utm_content=101514>
Eric Wright (i.e. @discoposse <http://www.discoposse.com/>), newest member of Team Turbo, continues the DevOps saga, exploring the origins of DevOps, widespread resistance to adopting DevOps, and its overall staying power... Blog: DevOps & CPU Ready Queueing <http://vmturbo.com/about-virtualization/ops-mars-devs-venus-pt-2-ready-ready-queue-sizing-conundrum/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ticker&utm_content=101514>
Eric Wright explores the mechanics of CPU ready queuing, one of the biggest disconnects between development and operations, including Multi-vCPU machines and CPU affinity rules. Blog: DevOps Ready Queues Pt. 2 <http://vmturbo.com/about-virtualization/virtualization/ops-mars-devs-venus-ready-queue-pt-2/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ticker&utm_content=101514>
Can't get enough @discoposse <http://www.discoposse.com/>? Eric Wright concludes the DevOps CPU Ready series with an exploration of CPU oversubscription, CPU reservations, and their impact on CPU ready. 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
